global.somethingWrong: Something went wrong, try again later

auth.loginToContinue: Log in to your Endpass account to access site actions

compositeAuth.successAuthMessage: You are successfully authorized. Dialog will be closed in a few seconds.
compositeAuth.linkSentMessage: An email with authorization link was sent on your address. Open it in the same browser to sign in. Also check spam folder and exclude Endpass from spam filters.

otp.enterCode: Enter the 6 digit code generated by your authenticator app.

recover.enterSeed: Enter recovery seed phrase of your wallet

scopes.allowScopes: Application requests following scopes. Press "Allow" button to grant these permissions.

account.donationError: Something went wrong. Try request dontaion later!

createWallet.recoverySubtitle: The words below are called your seed phrase. They enable you to access your Endpass and restore your wallet. It is very important that these words down in order shown.
createWallet.error: Something broken, when trying to create new Wallet
createWallet.seedConfirmation: I have written down the words and stored them in a secure place

password.incorrectPassword: Entered password is incorrect. Please, try again.

consentProvider.urlError: You should provide consent_challenge param in url, add it and try again!

loginProvider.notWorkingError: Sorry, but login provider is not working

loginProviderPassword.loginChallenge: You should provide login_challenge param in url, add it and try again!

components.notFound: Sorry, but place is not found

rateLimit.title: Rate limit exceed!
rateLimit.toMuch: Too much request from your IP address, please wait...

user.donationSuccess: Donation request successfully sent. In the most cases it can takes a few time before you will receive funds.

uploadDocument.exist: File already exist, please upload other file
uploadDocument.errorSizeLimit: Size of file is more than 10Mb, please select other file.
uploadDocument.errorOther: An error occurred during file upload, so try to upload the file again.

auth.failedToCheckStatus: Failed to check Oauth login status

requests.gasTooLow: Transaction gas to low. Try to increase gas price or gas limit

checkFile.invalidFile: Uploaded file is broken or has unknown format.

uploadDocument.exist: File already exist, please upload other file

signer.typedData: Sign typed data not supported yet!

mode.notLogged: You are not logged in at your identity server. Please log in with your identity provider, come back to this page, and try again.
mode.serverInvalid: The URL you have entered does not point to a valid identity server. Please double check the address and try again.
